article.aside: Add a flag to kcaldav.passwd(1) to create new principal's home directories and populate them with a simple kcaldav.conf(5) file. Completely re-write the internal iCalendar parser to get ready for handling iCalendar dates. Add a handler for the default time-zone, encouraging GMT use. Lastly, document each property we support (in the source) with a pointer to the RFC section.
